TaskDescription: This task consists of passive viewing of faces and objects, and passive listening to English speech and water sounds. A full description of the task is available at Puglia, M. H., Krol, K. M., Missana, M., Williams, C. L., Lillard, T. S., Morris, J. P., Connelly, J.J., & Grossmann, T. (2020). Epigenetic tuning of brain signal entropy in emergent human social behavior. BMC medicine, 18(1), 1-24. https://doi.org/10.1186/s12916-020-01683-x
